personalInfo.name: Sachin Tambe
personalInfo.title: Data Analyst & AI Engineer
personalInfo.tagline: Transforming raw data into strategic business decisions.
personalInfo.bio: I am a Data Analyst and AI Engineer specializing in building end-to-end data pipelines and predictive models. Moving beyond simple analysis, I engineer robust systems that automate reporting and integrate Generative AI to solve complex manufacturing and business problems. My stack includes Python, SQL, Cloud Infrastructure, and modern LLM frameworks.

experience.description: Leading data initiatives to optimize manufacturing workflows and reporting.
achievements: Architected an automated ETL pipeline using Python & SQL, cutting manual reporting time by 70% (15hrs/week saved).
Developed interactive Power BI dashboards monitoring production KPIs, leading to a 12% reduction in inventory waste.
Implemented a sales forecasting model achieving 95% accuracy, directly aiding supply chain planning.
Conducted root-cause analysis on production defects, identifying key variables that reduced defect rates by 8%.

projects.title: Enterprise RAG Document Assistant
projects.description: A production-ready Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system capable of ingesting thousands of PDF technical manuals. Uses LangChain for orchestration and Pinecone for vector storage to provide accurate, citation-backed answers to engineering queries.

projects.title: Predictive Maintenance Dashboard
projects.description: An end-to-end IoT analytics platform. Ingests real-time sensor data from manufacturing equipment using Kafka, processes it with Spark, and uses an LSTM neural network to predict machinery failure 48 hours in advance.

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction Pipeline
projects.description: A full ML pipeline automated with Airflow. Features automated data cleaning, feature engineering, and model retraining. Identifies high-risk customers and pushes segments directly to the CRM for retention campaigns.

projects.title: Automated Financial Fraud Detection
projects.description: Real-time anomaly detection system for financial transactions. Implements Isolation Forest and Autoencoders to flag suspicious activities with low latency. Includes a reporting layer for the risk management team.

education.description: Focus on Data Structures, Algorithms, and Database Management Systems.

certifications.name: Python for Data Science, AI & Development
Databases and SQL for Data Science
